title.narrative: CP SYSTEM BUILDING AND SERVICE PROVISION

description.narrative: National and sub national institutional management capacity strengthened for CP systems and services for most vulnerable children., which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: CHILD PROTECTION outcome: Girls and boys vulnerable and exposed to violence, abuse and exploitation are better protected by institutional (formal and informal) and legislative frameworks which include services and systems.
